name: Export Manager
description: Get optimal export settings for all platforms
author: raymAIzing film

steps.prompt:
Export settings for {{projectName}}:

TYPE: {{exportType}}
RESOLUTION: {{resolution}}
FORMAT: {{format}}
PLATFORM: {{platform}}

Provide:

## OPTIMAL EXPORT SETTINGS

### Video Settings
- Codec: [Recommended codec]
- Resolution: [Exact pixels]
- Frame Rate: [fps]
- Bitrate: [Mbps]
- Profile: [High/Main/etc]
- Level: [4.1/5.1/etc]

### Audio Settings
- Codec: [AAC/etc]
- Sample Rate: [48kHz/etc]
- Bitrate: [kbps]
- Channels: [Stereo/5.1]

### Container Settings
- Format: [.mp4/.mov/etc]
- Muxing: [Fast start enabled]

## PLATFORM-SPECIFIC REQUIREMENTS
- Max file size: [GB]
- Max duration: [minutes]
- Aspect ratio: [16:9/etc]
- Thumbnail specs: [Resolution]
- Caption format: [SRT/VTT]

## FILE NAMING CONVENTION
{{projectName}}_{{exportType}}_{{resolution}}_v[version].[ext]

Example: The_Last_Detective_Episode01_1080p_v1.mp4

## METADATA
- Title: {{projectName}}
- Description: [Template]
- Tags: [Suggested]
- Copyright: [Template]

## QUALITY CHECK
- [ ] Audio levels normalized (-14 LUFS)
- [ ] No clipping
- [ ] Color space correct
- [ ] Aspect ratio correct
- [ ] No black frames
- [ ] Captions synced

## ESTIMATED FILE SIZE
- Approximate: [GB/MB]
